alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Anderson, northeastern Abbeville and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Abbeville, or 5 miles east of Lake Secession, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Due West, Donalds, Shoals Junction, Lake Secession and Antreville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
